snippet: Defending women's champion Serena Williams resumes her pursuit of a seventh Australian Open singles title against Taiwan's Hsieh Su-wei on Wednesday, after fifth-seed Maria Sharapova takes on Aliaksandra Sasnovich at the Rod Laver Arena....
lead_paragraph: Defending women's champion Serena Williams resumes her pursuit of a seventh Australian Open singles title against Taiwan's Hsieh Su-wei on Wednesday, after fifth-seed Maria Sharapova takes on Aliaksandra Sasnovich at the Rod Laver Arena.

headline.print_headline: Serena, Djokovic Back in Action on Day Three in Melbourne
headline.main: Serena, Djokovic Back in Action on Day Three in Melbourne
